citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
**During a review of records it was noted that although the facility has an attending veterinarian, no written program of
veterinary care was available. A written program of veterinary care should be reviewed by the veterinarian to ensure the
animals are provided timely and adequate veterinary care in addition to regularly scheduled visits.
Correct by August 5, 2022
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with the facility representative.
